phrases: Why are all the Octobrists so fearful of them?
Those northern freaks came many times...
but they have never breached this wall.
We have been driving them to the other side for hundreds of years.
We are the people of Carneades, the protectors of this wall.
They will not even last two days.
I am going to Kafet to check on the situation.
Are you talking about those two old men?
If they do not lead the army, this country will be destroyed.
We cannot win a battle like this.
The power of Drifters alone cannot bring us a victory!
Act 3 Army of Ours-Sortie at Dawn
Are you telling me to give up my command...
Do not mess with me, magicians!
But if we do not let them lead, we will lose.
You are just a magician organization!
Besides, what can those two Drifters- those scruffy old men-do?!
What are you two arguing about?
Well... umm... we are trying to have him give up command of his troops to you two.
I know it is unreasonable, but...
Why on earth do we have to do such a thing?!
-What the hell are you talking about?!
I do not understand their language, but I could tell we were insulted.
I am about to pee my pants.
Aging causes me to have sudden urges to urinate.
I am fed up with this lightning of Carthage.
He is just a stupid old man!
There is no way I will give command to such an old wretch!
My Roman Empire did not fear
Yet, facing that man alone, Hannibal, did Rome tremble!
any enemy, even if there were millions of them.
You two, that is far enough.
Even if he gave in now, it is already pointless.
Soon, this place will descend into carnage.
Before the battle against the Black King's army begins,
we must allow the Drifters to escape...
W-Well, that is the assurance of the victor.
Besides, I am stronger than you.
What did you say, you beardless idiot?!
You want to fight, old man?!
Wh... is... the... con... dition... ther...
Ca... yo... hea... me, Gr... Mas...
There is no response from four reconnaissance units.
You are hiding the last two cigarettes, are not ya?!
Whose fault was it that we ended up in a place like this?!
Who would give ya cigarettes, ya fool?!
I want a cigarette so bad.
Wherever we go, there is no tomorrow...
We, the Wild Bunch, only got today.
I should at least be able to smoke as I please.
Crusade of his Majesty, the Black King.
It is the beginning of the eradication of mankind.
All your power to the Black King!
All your power to the Black King!
Do you hate us that much, Black King?
At last, you have made your move.
Are you really going to eradicate this world?
That is how I live my life.
So, allow me to continue on.
Do not let them close in!
From Air Command to Dragon Cavalry.
They are coming one after another.
From Agnela 1 of Air Command to Dragon Cavalry.
Backup requested by the Goblin 7th battalion.
But if a way for the Drifters to escape exists...
What the hell has just happened?!
Why the hell are you riding on a dragon, you idiot?!
Do not mess with me, you jackass!
For now, the Drifters' evacuation must be...
The Northern Wall was torn down!
I feel like my body is on fire...
Everything in this world should be burned to ash!
May I defrost it for you?
Hey, it is not looking good, is it?
Why do not we leave without'them?
We will catch up with you later.
Are those two old men going to be our cargo?
Why are ya dressed like that?!
There is nothing more that can be done here.
The Northern Wall, the Kingdom of Carneades, has fallen!
You must be disturbed by our sudden
request to fight so soon after your arrival.
How can we defeat that Black King?
Or do we even have a chance?
And if they join up with those guys, we still have hope.
Together with the warriors of the deserted castle...
I am going to destroy Rome.
We will see about that, old man!
We are almost at the West Gate.
Kanno Naoshi, the commander of the 301st Shinsengumi squadron!
Who do you think you are?!
I do not know what the hell is going on here, but...
I will never let you get away with this.
I will be sure to fix your mess!
You are not supposed to exist here!
You humans are fruit to be cast off.
The Drifters will not be allowed to live.
They must be brought to extinction.
By the mandate of the Inexorable Tribulation.
I lost contact with Grand Master.
No way the Northern Wall was breached, was it?
Furthermore, that crazy trio has been acting up.
I knew we were being watched.
It is a Leave your head here ghost!
She looks too stupid for that... or maybe...
Please do not take my head!
If you do not confess, I will let him take care of you.
I am Demon King of the Sixth Heaven.
My hobby is scorched earth and slaughter.
Let us make a toast with the skull of a person I killed!
I-I am a magician with the Octobrist Organization, Olminu.
I was just keeping an eye
on you Drifters under Grand Master's orders.
Did you hear what the idiot just said?
Explain in a way that even the fool can understand.
Do you want me to take your head?
So, you are, as she said, a leave your head here ghost, huh?
Here, those like you who are transported from the
other world are called the Drifters.
Our mission as the Octobrist Organization is...
And you were brought here to fight against the people called the Ends.
Demon King of the Sixth Heaven
